class multi_model[source]

multi_model(models, index=None)

Represents a list of bcml_object models, parameterized by a number

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Getting up and running

To create a multi_model object, you need to pass two arguments: a list of bcml_models, and index, a list (with the same length) of real numbers parameterizing (or indexing) your models (often the associated new particle mass).
